This application helps you in tweeting your or your friends facebook statuses.

You can tweet right from your facebook page. No need of navigating away from your facebook page. 

Other than just status updates,  you can even share any post in your groups, pages, feeds. 

This app removes unnecessary advertisements on your facebook wall.
